item.description:
Hello Sunshine!

We’re over the cold and ready for some serious summer fun at Shecky’s Girls Night Out! Gather your besties and join us for five hours of the coolest cocktails, delicious beer and food pairings, hot summer fashions with fantabulous markdowns, fun beauty discoveries, and of course, Shecky’s Famous Goodie Bag.




Place: Boston Center for the Arts - Cyclorama
539 Tremont St. (Clarendon & Berkeley Sts.)

SUBWAY
Orange line to Back Bay Station

PARKING
On-street parking is very limited in the immediate area. There's a garage at 100 Clarendon St. (btw. Stuart St. and Columbus Ave. just before Back Bay station). Regular evening rate is $12 after 5pm. PLEASE NOTE: Shecky's does NOT provide valet service. If you are approached by a valet, they are NOT associated with Shecky's and we suggest that you do not use them, as they have overcharged in the past.

PLEASE CLICK THE LINK BELOW TO PURCHASE YOU TICKET:
item.name: SHECKY'S GIRLS NIGHT OUT!
